translations: v.节省，节约（economise 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 节约自由度, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: Darwin used the beehive as an example of evolution, saying it "was absolutely perfect in economising labour and wax".
sentences.translation: 达尔文把蜂箱作为进化的一个例子，称其“在节约劳动和蜂蜡方面是绝对完美的”。

sentences.sentence: By economising on scarce mobile spectrum, femtocells might prove most useful in managing the rapid growth of internet and video traffic to smartphones and tablet computers.
sentences.translation: 通过节省稀缺的移动频谱资源，飞蜂窝或许还能在应对激增的智能手机，平板电脑的网络以及影像流量上发挥最大的作用。
